name: Darn Tough Top Down Solid Socks - Women's
description: Super-low-cut socks that hide inside your shoes. When your shoes are on, these socks are gone.Lightweight merino blend with no cushioning to smoothly glide into close-fitting shoes without bunching.Merino wool is antibacterial to repel odour and keep the socks smelling fresh.Seamless construction keeps your feet chafe-free.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
